Room.Name: Nagaritha Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Nagaritha Drive, north of the Corn Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The DeNail Corn Fields are located to the south of here. Farmer DeNail is always willing to hire on any unskilled laborers to pick corn and scare away crows and other pests. The entrance to the Corn Fields is located off of Lankshire Parkway to the east. On the north side of the road, you can see the Oceancrest Grannary building, which is currently under construction. The current grannary has exceeded its capacity, thus a new one is being built to supplement it.
